playn.core.gl

Class GL20Buffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • playn.core.gl.GL20Buffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GLBuffer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GL20Buffer.FloatImpl, GL20Buffer.ShortImpl

    public abstract class GL20Buffer
extends Object
implements GLBuffer
    GLBuffer implementation based on java.nio and usable with GL20.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • send

        public int send(int target,
                int usage)
        Description copied from interface: GLBuffer
        Sends this buffer's data to GL, using glBufferData. A call to GLBuffer.bind(int) must precede this call. This resets the buffer offset to zero and prepares the buffer for the accumulation of new elements.
        Specified by:
        send in interface GLBuffer
        Returns:
        the number of elements in the buffer at the time it was bound.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Description copied from interface: GLBuffer
        Releases any GL resources used by this buffer. The buffer may not be used subsequently.
        Specified by:
        destroy in interface GLBuffer
